ThingDef.label: multispectrum eye
ThingDef.description: By integrating cells that allow for collection of light in the ultraviolent and infrared spectrum, these eyes allow for much more spacial awareness of their host.

ThingDef.label: micro-analyzer nose
ThingDef.description: Increasing the amount of cells dedicated to analyzing specific molecules, certain scents can be more easily distinguished from surrounding gasses.

ThingDef.label: pheromone releaser nose
ThingDef.description: By adding special pheromone glands to the base of the nose, the host can slightly alter the disposition of those they are communicating with.

ThingDef.label: multifrequency ear
ThingDef.description: By increasing the spectrum of frequencies able to be picked up, as well as allowing the host to temporarily focus on one frequency, these ears allows the host to percieve all sounds in the vicinity.

ThingDef.label: distendable jaw
ThingDef.description: By allowing the jaw to detach from the skull while still delivering a powerful bite, this jaw allows the host to consume food at a rapid rate.

ThingDef.label: venomous fangs
ThingDef.description: By producing a deadly venom and injecting it into the enemy, the host has a hidden weapon available in all situations.
